ExperienceSummary.ExecutiveBrief: Sagar Bijili has been working in the IT occupational sector for more than 6 years. Currently he is employed as a Java/J2EE Developer at ASHLAND INC. Sagar has extensive knowledge of JavaScript, Struts Web Application Framework, Java 2 Enterprise Edition, Hibernate, Java Server Pages, Java, HTML, JUnit, Cascading Style Sheets, Java Servlets, Spring Framework, MVC, XML, Web Services, SQL, Oracle, DB2, XHTML, WebLogic Enterprise Application Server, Oracle PL/SQL, Jboss, JavaServer Faces, JDBC, Enterprise Java Beans, ECLiPSe, AJAX, UML/OMT, Rational Rose, Oracle 10G, Microsoft SQL Server, Log4j, Linux, Jakarta TOMCAT Servlet Engine, IBM WebSphere, UNIX, TOAD, Stored Procedures, SOAP, GUI Applications, Class Diagrams, Apache Subversion, jQuery, WinCVS, WebSphere Studio Application Developer, RationalRoseXDE, REST, Oracle Applications, Oracle 11g, ORACLE WebLogic, MESSAGE QUEUE, Java Swing, Java AWT, JSON, JNDI, JIRA, JDK. So far Sagar has not gained any managerial experience.
